title: The Locust Incomplete Discography
description:
*******************************************************
*******************************************************
***                                                 ***
***  Please help support not only this  torrent by  ***
***  seeding to at  least a 1.0 ratio, but also by  ***
***  supporting the musicians that make this music  ***
***  by going out and buying  their  music, merch,  ***
***  going to their  shows, or even just  donating  ***
***  some  money to them!  At least telling  other  ***
***  people to buy their album to check it out. =)  ***
***                                                 ***
*******************************************************
*******************************************************
+-----------------------------------------------------+
|                                                     |
|  This torrent is an incomplete discography for The  |
|  Locust                                             |
|                                                     |
|  It includes the following albums:                  |
|                                                     |
|    * [1998] The Locust                              |
|    * [2000] Well I'll Be A Monkey's Uncle EP        |
|    * [2001] Flight Of The Wounded Locust            |
|    * [2003] Follow The Flock, Step In Shit EP       |
|    * [2003] Plague Soundscapes                      |
|    * [2004] The Locust EP (Re-Release)              |
|    * [2005] Safety Second, Body Last EP             |
|    * [2007] New Erections                           |
|                                                     |
|  Some Information:                                  |
|                                                     |
|    The Locust,  Follow The Flock Step In Shit  EP,  |
|    Plague Soundscapes, Safety Second Body Last EP,  |
|    and New Erections are all ~220 VBR.              |
|                                                     |
|    Well  I'll  Be A Monkey's Uncle,  Flight Of The  |
|    Wounded Locust,  and The Locust EP (Re-Release)  |
|    are all 192 CBR.                                 |
|                                                     |
|    All track information should be correct, but if  |
|    anyone finds any errors,  please point them out  |
|    to me.
|                                                     |
|    Unfortunately I'm missing some split EP's,  one  |
|    with Melt Banana,  another with Bastard  Noise,  |
|    I don't recall any others,  but I'm pretty sure  |
|    that all of the music that is on those  splits,  |
|    is on the albums I have included.  My apologies  |
|    also for only having the reissue of "The Locust  |
|    EP" not the original.                            |
|                                                     |
|  Cheers, and happy listening!                       |
|                                                     |
+-----------------------------------------------------+
